pullrequest.title: Add a new semi-supervised test case

content.raw:
If the supervision region is assigned to label 0, it's inital mean will be the same as the inital mean for unsupervised region have label 0, i.e. the vector (0.57, 0.48)

If the supervision region is assigned to label 3, it's inital mean will be the same as the inital mean for unsupervised region have label 3, i.e. the vector (0.51, 0.57)
content.html:
If the supervision region is assigned to label 0, it's inital mean will be the same as the inital mean for unsupervised region have label 0, i.e. the vector (0.57, 0.48)

If the supervision region is assigned to label 3, it's inital mean will be the same as the inital mean for unsupervised region have label 3, i.e. the vector (0.51, 0.57)
